title: Bots in league
body:
Hi everyone,

It has recently come to my attention that bots passing as summoners have appeared in my recent normal (draft) games. I would like to inquire if this a recent trend or if i have just hit such a low point in my league mmr that i can be put with these sorts of fellow.

Now, for those who would shun me for calling other bots on the account of them being simply inexperienced, I would like to raise the fact that I was playing Azir, and for those who never tested Azir against low level bots, bots do no register soldiers as a threat, making bot identification one of the many abilities of this wonderful champion. Indeed, by simply placing a soldier next to a bot, it is possible to see their lack of reaction to the possibility of getting stabbed, proving their artificial nature.

I thank you for taking the time to read this,

Alors Azir.
{{champion:268}}

replies.body: Bots aren't really something new to League, but they do mainly end up staying in lower mmr matches. If you happen across them, feel free to hit that report button and send them our way!
Under what category do we file it?
If they were bots, they were most likely feeding/inting/helping the enemy team? One of those should do the trick.
